assignments.description: This assignment makes all collections for the icons, labels and descriptions empty, so the buttons will not been shown multiple times when the flow keeps running.
assignments.name: assEmptyCollectionsforQuickChouice
assignments.label: assEmptyCollectionsforQuickChouice

assignments.description: This element will assign the focusclient prio to the selected records

assignments.label: assFocusClient

assignments.description: This element will assign the focusclient prio to the selected records
assignments.name: assFocusClient_0
assignments.label: assFocusClient

assignments.description: This element will remove the focus client to the selected records
assignments.name: assFocusClientNextYear
assignments.label: assFocusClientNextYear

decisions.description: This element checks which button is pressed: Set or Remove as Focus Client
decisions.name: dcsButtonPressed
decisions.label: dcsButtonPressed

decisions.description: This element will check if there are any focus clients found for the logged in user.
decisions.name: dcsFocusClients
decisions.label: dcsFocusClients

decisions.description: This element will check if there are any focus clients for next year are found for the logged in user.
decisions.name: dcsFocusClientsNextYear
decisions.label: dcsFocusClientsNextYear

decisions.description: This element checks if the user clicked on the button Yes or No.
decisions.name: dcsWarning
decisions.label: dcsButtonWarning

Flow.description: This screenflow gives the user the option to prioritize his or her focus clients.

formulas.name: fmQueryCurrentFocusClients
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerLoggedInForm__c = TRUE AND FocusClientPick__c = '" + {!qcSelection.value} + "'"

formulas.name: fmQueryNextYearFocusClients
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, AccountNameForm__c, Name, StatusPick__c, FocusClientNextYearPick__c FROM BusinessUnitSpecificAttribute__c WHERE BusinessUnitOwnerLoggedInForm__c = TRUE AND FocusClientNextYearPick__c = '" + {!qcSelection.value} + "'"

formulas.name: fmTableTitleFocusClientsCurrentYear
formulas.expression: IF ({!fmUserLanguageCode} = 'nl_NL', "Mijn " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus klanten voor " + {!fmThisYear}, "My " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus clients for " + {!fmThisYear})

formulas.name: fmTableTitleFocusClientsNextYear
formulas.expression: IF ({!fmUserLanguageCode} = 'nl_NL', "Mijn " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus klanten voor " + {!fmNextYear}, "My " + {!qcSelection.value} + " focus clients for " + {!fmNextYear})

formulas.name: fmTaskMessage
formulas.expression: "Beste " + {!$User.ManagerFullName__c} + "," + br() + br() + "Mijn lijst met focus klanten voor " + {!fmNextYear} + "staat klaar voor accordering. Kun je deze s.v.p beoordelen?"

formulas.description: Extracts this user language code from the current user.
formulas.name: fmUserLanguageCode

Flow.interviewLabel: Business Unit - SCFL01 - Prioritize Focus Clients {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Business Unit - SCFL01 - Prioritize Focus Clients

fields.name: dtTitle
fields.fieldText: Focus Client Wizard

fields.name: dtDescription
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to the focus client wizard. With this tool you can select your focus clients for next year. ({!fmNextYear}).


Please select one of the buttons to start the prioritizing of existing or new clients.

value.stringValue: [{"apiName":"AccountNameForm__c","guid":"column-9dde","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Account","wrapText":true,"order":0,"label":"Account Name","type":"customRichText"},{"apiName":"Name","guid":"column-ba29","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":true,"customHeaderLabel":"Business Unit","wrapText":true,"order":1,"label":"Business Unit Specific Attribute Name","type":"text"},{"apiName":"StatusPick__c","guid":"column-2fac","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":2,"label":"Status","type":"text"},{"apiName":"FocusClientNextYearPick__c","guid":"column-e62f","editable":false,"hasCustomHeaderLabel":false,"customHeaderLabel":"","wrapText":true,"order":3,"label":"Focus Client Next Year","type":"text"}]

fields.name: dtTitleAddAccount
fields.fieldText: ﻿Add New Focus Client for {!fmNextYear}

fields.name: dtDescription2
fields.fieldText: Are you ready with prioritising your accounts and are you sure that you want to submit this list for approval?
